summary:
"Some people define themselves more by what they oppose than by what they propose.  These people are the least likely to accomplish anything of lasting value. "

42/100
title: Quote, Unquote

summary: A response to a blog post that posed the question: are blogging challenges really worth it
title: Are Blogging Challenges Worth It?

summary:
Passkeys are not passwords
Passkeys have been a thing for a little while now, and if you know me you know that I’m a big fan of the technology.  They bring the power of public-key cryptography to individual website authentication, and they do it in a way that (usually) feels like magic.  It’s pretty awesome stuff...
title: Passkeys are not passwords

summary:
> LINK · 'Scroll to a billion' by aeiowu
A very simple site which does the best job at demonstrating just how obscenely huge a billion is through the simple act of scrolling.  You will almost certainly not scroll to the end.  Trust me
title: > How big is a billion?
